analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  saraṇadukaḥ āsava gocchaka ādi
translated: The reverse order of the dependent origination, the two-by-two dependent origination

original: Naaraṇaṁ naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Naaraṇaṁ nasaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Naaraṇaṁ naganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na araṇam na āsavam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  ekam pe avigate eka  na araṇam na saññojanam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ saññojanaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  na araṇam na gantham dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ ganthaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The two-by-two dependent origination, the two-by-two dependent origination with the defilements as the first, etc.

original: Naaraṇaṁ naoghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Naaraṇaṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇam na ogham dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽ekam pe avigate eka 🔽na araṇam no yogam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With respect to the clause “A fetter that is not a non-araṇa dhammā …”: With respect to the clause “A fetter that is not a non-āsava dhammā …”: With respect to the clause “A fetter that is not a non-saññojana dhammā …”: With respect to the clause “A fetter that is not a non-gantha dhammā …”: With respect to the clause “A fetter that is not a non-ogha dhammā …”: With respect to the clause “A fetter that is not a non-yoga dhammā …”:

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Naaraṇaṁ nanīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ekam pe avigate eka  na araṇam na nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ nīvaraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With root cause as condition, one … With unwholesome as condition, one … With rootless as condition, one … With neutral as condition, one … With unentangled as condition, one …🔽With a non-hindrance as condition, a hindrance … (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Naaraṇaṁ naparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ekam pe avigate eka  na araṇam na parāmāsam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ parāmāsaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With root cause as condition, one … With unwholesome as condition, one … With rootless as condition, one … With neutral as condition, one … With unentangled as condition, one …🔽With a non-clinging-aggregate as condition, a clinging-aggregate … (Abbreviated.)
With root cause as condition, one … With unwholesome as condition, one … With rootless as condition, one … With neutral as condition, one … With unentangled as condition, one …
